blocks.label: api_url, repo, sha, github_token, current_run_id = get_environment_variables()

data = make_api_request(endpoint, headers)
check_runs = data["check_runs"]
print("Processing check runs...")
print(check_runs)

print("Some check runs are still in progress. Waiting {CHECK_INTERVAL} seconds before checking again...")
time.sleep(CHECK_INTERVAL)

print("All other completed check runs have passed. This check passes.")
sys.exit(0)

print("Some check runs have failed or have not completed. This check fails.")
sys.exit(1)
